objects.text:
Advanced ZPTO Formula
Clinically Proven Relief
Removes Dandruff from First Wash
100% Smoother Hair

product_details.name: Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo for Dry, Itchy & Flaky Scalp, 650 ml
product_details.description: Scared of going out with white scalp flakes over your shoulder? When white flakes appear, all we want to know is how to prevent dandruff – and quickly. Say 'bye' to dandruff and dryness with the Dove Dandruff Care Shampoo. The ZPTO formula is clinically proven to target dandruff at its source. This shampoo removes dandruff* from your scalp without causing harm to your hair. Clinically tested, the formula enriched with ZPTO is proven to be successful at removing dandruff without leaving your hair dry & rough. ZPTO formula starts to clear visible flakes from the first wash. This gentle shampoo effectively relieves dandruff associated itches and clears up white flakes with regular use. The unique formula nourishes from roots up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*, for hair you can be proud of in no time. This anti-dandruff shampoo nourishes your hair from root up, combining beautiful hair results with effective dandruff relief*. Step out of the shower to soft, smooth and visibly flake- free strands*: quick results, with nourishing care, too. For best results, use Dove Dandruff Care shampoo along with Dove Dandruff Care conditioner together. *No visible flakes with regular product use, effect may vary with person.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a clean and modern layout with a strong emphasis on a personal care product. The design adopts a soft blue gradient background enhanced by abstract wave patterns and subtle circular overlays, lending a calm and fresh ambiance. A prominent product image ("product_image") is positioned to the right, balanced by a hierarchy of bold textual elements on the left. The header ("heading") and subheader ("subheading") use uppercase, bold typography to capture attention. A supporting paragraph ("description") details the product benefits, and a large, distinguished price label ("price") follows. Action elements include a call-to-action button ("cta") with a contrasting solid blue background ("cta_background") and a lightly emphasized rectangular tag ("tagline_background") declaring credibility, containing the "tagline". Graphical embellishments ("decorative") and bordered frames add structure and polish to the overall layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #004b8d
- Sky Blue: #005eb8
- Gold: #d4af37
- Soft White: #F0F8FF
- Charcoal: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a clean and refreshing color palette with a dominant use of white (#FFFFFF), symbolizing purity and cleanliness. Midnight blue (#1F3A93) and sky blue (#A6D3F2) are used for the Dove logo and text, conveying trust and calmness. Light gray (#A0A0A0) is used on the pump cap, blending subtly into the white bottle while adding a modern feel. Warm gold (#D8B259) is sparingly used to highlight key features like "Clinically Proven" and “Micro Moisture Serum,” drawing attention without overpowering. This balanced blend of neutral and cool tones highlights both professionalism and care in the design.
